value.title: Startup that Taps AI to Boost Crop Yields Seeks Canadian IPO
value.excerpt: Farmers Edge Inc., a firm that uses artificial intelligence to help growers boost crop yields, is seeking to raise about C$100 million ($79 million) in an initial public offering to strengthen its finances and repay debt.

value.title: Nuance acquires Saykara to build out healthcare AI tools
value.excerpt: Nuance Communications has acquired Saykara, a startup that developed an artificial intelligence-powered physician assistant tool. The deal will help Nuance boost its capabilities in healthcare AI.

value.title: Iron Pillar leads $5 million funding round in AI startup Ushur
value.excerpt: Ushur is Iron Pillars second investment from its second fund, which is expected to announce its first close in a couple of months, co-founder Mohanjit Jolly says.

value.title: Alpha Health Publishes Comprehensive "Buyer's Guide to Healthcare Revenue Cycle Automation"
value.excerpt: Today, Alpha Health, the first Unified Automation™ company for revenue cycle management in healthcare, published its "Buyer's Guide to Healthcare Revenue Cycle Automation." The free, 28-page booklet is meant to serve as a thoughtful guide to purchasing and deploying effective automation solutions within healthcare revenue cycle operations - from industry best practices to the variables that may be unique to individual organizations.

value.title: Sony AI's Dr. Peter Stone Named Fellow by the Association for Computing Machinery
value.excerpt: Dr. Peter Stone, Executive Director, Sony AI America Inc., has been named a Fellow by the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM), the premier professional organization in the field of computer science.

value.title: The Queen's Gambit helped Square Off see huge uptake in robot chess sales

value.title: Finch Capital’s New Fund to Target Fintech, AI Startups in Europe
value.excerpt: Finch Capital, a UK and Netherlands based VC firm, has closed on a new fund - Europe III - raising €150 million to invest in Fintechs and artificial intelligence (AI) startups in the financial services sector.

value.title: Theator raises $15.5 million to analyze surgical footage with computer vision
value.excerpt: Theator, a startup developing a 'surgical intelligence' platform powered by computer vision, has raised $15.5 million.

value.title: Major camera company can sort people by race, alert police when it spots Uighurs
value.excerpt: Facial recognition software developed by Dahua, a Chinese video surveillance firm sanctioned by the U.S., purports to detect the race of individuals caught on camera and offers to alert police clients when it identifies members of the Turkic ethnic group Uighurs.
